attributes.action: Make eye-examination results to be printed on the driving licence and if correction to be worn while driving and include the fees of eye exam in taxing the vehical so no one is driving without adequate correction.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Eye examination result printed on all driving licence.
As an student optometrist I find it important to have eye exam upto date while driving, as it is a requirement to have MOT to see if vehical is road worthy so why not our eyes, as we will be driving with use our eyes. Suggestion to include the fees of eye exam in taxing the vehical and optometrist can claim it off dvla or adequate source, Thus no one is driving without inadequate correction and thus decrease road accidents in future as less drivers driving without accurate vision.
